price: Abraham kaa sε: “Daabi, wͻn mu (bosom) kεseε woi na ayε, enti sε (abosom no) kasa a, εneε momisa wͻn“.
arabic: قَالَ بَلۡ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمۡ هَٰذَا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُمۡ إِن كَانُواْ يَنطِقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla bal faʿalahu kabīruhum hādhā fasalūhum in kānū yanṭiqūna
